DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of different methods for measuring peoples corneal thickness
DOC.brief_title: Comparation of Different Devices to Measure Corneal Thickness
DOC.detailed_description: Volunteers with healthy corneas will be measured by different instruments to detect their corneal thickness. First interindividual difference between the instruments will be reviewed. People will be measured again two times on two different days to examine an interindividual difference in all instruments.
DOC.criteria: healthy cornea myopia or astigmatism over 1,5 dpt corneal surgery acute ocular inflammation lost of vision
